snippet.title: Corridor Crusaders Rewrite: Week 2
snippet.description:
This week I went on vacation to visit family, but I still got a lot done. The main focus of this week was the cosmetic menu. While this isn't a lot in and of itself, the preview feature led me to create some of the newer game logic. Because I was thinking about how to preview the map, keeping in mind that I may want to add 2v2 support down the road, I redesigned the map model to allow me to *easily* support more than two players in a single game.


Join the discord here to follow news and find matches:
https://discord.gg/a8jGsXT


Consider supporting the project on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/corridorcrusaders
